summaryINEP: Educational Management Dashboard 2022: A data management and visualization system based on INEP's microdata. Provides a unified and intuitive view of basic education in Brazil, enabling clear and effective monitoring of school and student situations to promote efficient educational management.
summaryRecDaTerra: RecDaterra is a digital platform developed as a university project at the Universidade Cat√≥lica de Pernambuco. It connects small businesses in Recife with the community, promoting local products and services and enabling direct interaction between consumers and suppliers. Explore and support a vibrant, sustainable community.

summaryMarvel: Marvel Characters Visualization: A website that uses the Marvel Comics public API to display Marvel characters. Users can view a comprehensive list of all characters and search for specific ones, providing an easy and interactive way to explore the Marvel Universe.

aboutText: Hello! I'm a passionate developer constantly learning and growing. I specialize in back-end development with Java and Node.js. I enjoy working on innovative projects that make an impact.
summaryPortfolio: My Portfolio is a virtual showcase highlighting my journey as a Full Stack developer in training. Featuring a minimalist design and subtle yet original animations, the portfolio is fully translated into English and Portuguese, offering a visual and functional experience to explore my projects and skills.
work_presentation: Work Presentation, Oratory, Group Management, Discipline, Organization
summaryCaremind: Caremind Edu is an app focused on the physical and mental well-being of educators who face stress and overload in the workplace. The app offers daily self-care activities that are simple and relaxing, rewarding points upon completion. These points can be used to unlock informative articles that assist in professional and personal optimization. Additionally, Caremind Edu provides access to psychologists, allowing users to schedule sessions and receive specialized support, promoting the mental health of educators.
